definition: clique/school/group/faction/to dispatch/to send/to assign/to appoint/pi (Greek letter Ππ)/the circular ratio pi = 3.1415926/(loanword) pie
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: English has a lot of words which are made by composition and derivation.
sentences.chinese: 英语有大量的合成词和派生词。

sentences.english: This word is a derivative. Can you point out its root?
sentences.chinese: 这是个派生词，你能指出它的词根吗？

sentences.english: Chapter 4 is with the prefix "a" analysis of derivative word recognition.
sentences.chinese: 第四章是对带前缀“阿”的派生词的识别分析。

sentences.english: Chapter Two is about the derivatives of eponyms.
sentences.chinese: 第二章是关于名祖名词的派生词。

definition: radical of a compound word (in European language)
part of speech (noun, verb, adjective etc)/lexical category
uncommon meaning of a common word
prefix or suffix of a compound word/affix (linguistics)
